title: F/S - T205 Cycle Miller Huggins - No Creases - SOLD!
author: old-baseball

posts.post_title: F/S - T205 Cycle Miller Huggins - No Creases - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Nice looking T205 of Miller Huggins with the more desirable cycle back.  Card has no creasing and is sharp and bright.  Only issue is that the gold borders have been touched up with a gold pen.  Asking $50 shipped.  Paypal (gift), checks or money orders acceptable.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url] .
